input_text:
Job Title: Datawarehouse / ETL Developer

Location: Chicago, IL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
Description 

We are looking for someone strong in SQL, Datawarehouse, ETL, and be local to Chicago.

Strong Data warehouse concepts â€“ Hands on experience working in a datawarehouse environment

Strong Complex SQL - analyzing data sets & etc, data flow diagrams, ETL (python framework - ETL ingested).

Snowflake experience would be an excellent bonus!

Strong soft-skills - strong analytical & problem solving skills, ability to work & collaborate well with the IT & business, good communication & presentation skills.

Business requirements are data requirements. Have to understand, query, profile data to come up with specifications.

Strong SQL skills and data warehouse understanding

Write complex SQL and analysis exiting data sets, look at processing and recommend solutions

Strong analytics and data skills

Gather data requirements, work independently, good understanding of data models and coming up with ETL specification

Provide data flow diagrams, data models including structures, definitions.

Good presentation/communication skills- both with technical and business partners

Validate data accuracy, quality. Certify data before productionized

Help address issues through dev pipeline.

Once developed/productionized support issue, consult with team and provide solution

Document design specifications

 Skills 

Etl, Sql, Data warehouse, Erpss, Data, technology design docs, Snowflake

 Additional Skills & Qualifications 

Great if they have Snowflake (snowflake cloud) experience

 Experience Level 

Expert Level

 About TEKsystems 

We're partners in transformation. We help clients activate ideas and solutions to take advantage of a new world of opportunity. We are a team of 80,000 strong, working with over 6,000 clients, including 80% of the Fortune 500, across North America, Europe and Asia. As an industry leader in Full-Stack Technology Services, Talent Services, and real-world application, we work with progressive leaders to drive change. That's the power of true partnership. TEKsystems is an Allegis Group company.

The company is an equal opportunity employer and will consider all applications without regards to race, sex, age, color, religion, national origin, veteran status, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, genetic information or any characteristic protected by law.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
